text: Sogdia () or Sogdiana was an ancient Iranian civilization in present-day Uzbekistan, Tajikstan and Kyrgyzstan, located in Central Asia. ==Related pages== * Kipchaks * Tocharians * Tang Dynasty * Achaemenid Empire * Indo- Iranian peoples * Indo-Iranian languages ==Further reading== * ==Other websites== * Sogdian on Interlinguae * Xerxes II and Sogdianus * The Sogdians: Influencers on the Silk Roads (Online exhibition) ==References== * * Ahmed, S.
